name: CONFINEMECH
description:
As Royal Mecha-Vizier, you have earned the favor of the nobility by using your magical 'Swap' power to solve land disputes. Fearing your inevitable betrayal, King Confinemech has sent his armies of wizards, robotanks, and mechdragons to assassinate you.

Conquer them by Swapping the earth! Dodge their shots and crush them with their own bullets!

Controls:
Movement: WASD or Arrows
Swap: Left mouse click
Speed Up Time: Spacebar

Made for Bullet Hell Jam 2022 with the theme "Confined"

Code - Erik Singer
Art - Sean Hayden

Music - 
Peritune Material : Steam_Fortress, Gothic_Dark, Sparkle
Juhani Junkala : Level 1
Abstraction : Out of Time
